Class Hitbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.Hitbox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Hitbox
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Class Hitbox, which is used to perform collision logic between interactables.
    See Also:
